events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a tree on April 9th, causing significant damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords such as ‘vehicle,’ ‘accident,’ and ‘collision’ in the initial report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure thorough handling and prompt communication with the customer.
The customer was notified that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and the investigation process will begin shortly.
Request sent to the customer for additional documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
The customer submitted the requested documents on time, including all photographic evidence and official police documentation.
Claims investigator began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted repair shops to verify the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded successfully with confirmation that the damages resulted solely from the reported accident with no policy violations.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering full repairs and rental car costs during the vehicle’s downtime.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and appreciated the timely communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved based on the customer’s acceptance of the proposed settlement and final review by the claims team.
The approved settlement amount was processed and payment issued to the customer’s designated account for vehicle repairs.
Following payment, the auto accident claim was formally closed with confirmation that the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
All claim files and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
